A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Left the theater with nothing.  Was relieved that my 12 year old daughter\, who I turned into a Star Wars geek\, hated it as well.  I was very critical of the prequels\, but would watch any of them before I go back into this debacle of a soulless movie.  Some were worried that it would be a rehash of Empire.  (If only it was\, then I may have had an emotional reaction)
